name: VamBot
description:
So I made this game for LD39 which had the theme "running out of power".  I decided to make a game about a vampire robot that has to suck energy from other bots to survive.  It's a survival-based action game, where the length of time you've survived along with your kill count are tallied.  Hope you enjoy!

All was made by me, from scratch, in about 30 hours.
